attributes.action: Disabled need extra to Pay for Petrol-Diesel
attributes.additional_details:
The Price of Fuel is to much for the Disabled to cope with when they have to use there Vehicles.
 I call on THE GOVERNMENT TO GIVE  A  EXTRA AMOUNT (to pay the high cost of Fuel ) ON there D.L.A. Mobility Payment to cover this EXTRA COST to them that they have to pay, as these persons have no choice BUT to USE there VEHICLES.
